items.text: full on middle, drilled back
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short of a length on off, cautiously blocks into the off side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run

items.preText: Chamika: "I think SL doing just fine. This is much better than getting all out within 40overs "
items.text: full, chases away from the body and drives to third man off the outside of the bat
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, opens the face to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: full, wide, chases as it drifts away further and gets beaten
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run

items.text: full outside leg, off the pads towards short fine as he looks to clip it out
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Tharanga, 1 leg bye

items.text: full on off, driven to mid-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, no run

items.text: slower full ball at 124.2ks, rolled his fingers over it, drilled straight back
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short, wide, opens the face to point who dives to his left
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, 1 run

items.preText: Gaurav Madan: "Given the conditions and attack, I guess 270 will be a good defendable total, and with wickets in hand, they look on track for that"
items.text: short of a length, pitches outside leg, guided to point with an open face
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Tharanga, no run

items.text: no man's land again. Tharanga puts his wrists to use again. It's full and slower, stops on him and he mistimes a flick, chipping it in the air towards the cow corner boundary
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Tharanga, 2 runs

items.text: full on middle and leg, flicked wide of mid-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: plumb. Tharanga is discussing with Chandimal for the review and decides to take it but hard to see this get overturned. Scrambled seam fuller length ball, misses the inside edge as Tharanga presses forward. Ah. That has actually nipped back in sharply and Hawkeye says the angle would have carried it past the leg stump. Tharanga survives
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, no run

items.text: gone next ball. Completely messes up the timing on his pull. He rolls his fingers over a shortish one and as a result the ball doesn't get up as much as Tharanga anticipated as well. Shoots past from underneath the bat and cuts in to hit the stumps. 50th ODI wicket for Mustafizur
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Tharanga, OUT

dismissal.text: WU Tharanga  b Mustafizur Rahman 56 (99b 5x4 0x6) SR: 56.56

items.text: short of a length, seams back in, tucked with the angle into the on side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Perera, no run

items.preText: Nayeem: "Fastest Bangladeshi to have 50 wickets in ODIs, keep going "The Fizz"."
items.text: short ball, very well-directed and forcing the batsman to very hurriedly swing out of the line
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Perera, no run

items.text: short of a length, defended from the crease to mid-off
items.postText: Wicket at a crucial juncture for Bangladesh, and that too of a set batsman. SL now need to be careful not to slow down again. They need to play their best cricket in the last 14 overs.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Perera, no run

items.preText: Reshad : "Can't believe Tharanga's luck! Dodged 4 reviews, catches fell in no man's land and he got out without scoring big! "
items.text: full on the pads, flicked to square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: was that in the air?. Short ball, pulls dominantly and forcefully but straight to midwicket who makes a brilliant stop getting down to his right
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Perera, no run

items.text: full and right on the stumps, pushed back
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Perera, no run

items.text: back of a length and some width, punched with an open face through the cover region
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Perera, 1 run

items.text: short of good length, punched to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: misses everything. Top delivery from Rubel. A rip-roaring length ball that cuts in, beats the inside edge, goes over the pad, and finally the stumps with all three in line
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short, wide, slapped to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Perera, 1 run

items.text: fullish length outside off, defended into the covers
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run
